Moritz Osnabrügge

I am a Postdoctoral Research Officer at the London School of Economics and Political Science.


My research focuses on political economy and quantitative methods. My articles have been published in The Journal of Politics, Political Analysis, Political Science Research and Methods, Research & Politics and European Union Politics.


I teach comparative politics, international relations and quantitative text analysis.


I hold a Ph.D. from the University of Mannheim and a M.Sc. from the London School of Economics and Political Science.
